## Packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

## Import

```{r}

sample_info <- read_csv("sample_info (2).csv")

sample_info


```

## Data Wrang

```{r}
sample_info <- sample_info %>%
 filter(sex %in% params$sex | is.na(sex))
```

## Data Viz

```{r}
p <- ggplot(sample_info) +
  aes(x = primary_disease, fill = primary_or_metastasis) +
  geom_bar() +
  scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_minimal()

ggplotly(p)
```
